source:
Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

# #Create DataFrame for the publictrip TMS Table
# publictrip = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/TMS/publictrip.parquet', format='parquet')
# publictrip.createOrReplaceTempView("publictrip")

# #Create DataFrame for the publicdispatch ORV Table
# publicdispatch = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicdispatch.parquet', format='parquet')
# publicdispatch.createOrReplaceTempView("publicdispatch")

# #Create DataFrame for the dbolhtrip LMS Table
# dbolhtrip = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbolh_trip.parquet', format='parquet')
# dbolhtrip.createOrReplaceTempView("dbolhtrip")

# #Create DataFrame for the dbolhtrackstatus LMS Table
# dbolhtrackstatus = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbolh_trackstatus.parquet', format='parquet')
# dbolhtrackstatus.createOrReplaceTempView("dbolhtrackstatus")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_tms
AS
SELECT 
    lt.id as tms_trip_id
    ,lt.driverid as tms_trip_driverid
    ,lt.vehicleid as tms_trip_vehicleid
    ,lt.trailerid as tms_trip_trailerid
    ,lt.sectrailerid as tms_trip_sectrailerid
    ,lt.status as tms_trip_status
    ,lt.routeid as tms_trip_routeid
    ,lt.opsrouteid as tms_trip_opsrouteid
    ,lt.startfromaddress as tms_trip_startfromaddress
    ,lt.startfromlat as tms_trip_startfromlat
    ,lt.startfromlng as tms_trip_startfromlng
    ,to_timestamp(lt.dispatchdate) as tms_trip_dispatchdate
    ,lt.stopaddress as tms_trip_stopaddress
    ,lt.stoplat as tms_trip_stoplat
    ,lt.stoplng as tms_trip_stoplng
    ,to_timestamp(lt.insdate) as tms_trip_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.moddate) as tms_trip_moddate
    ,lt.insby as tms_trip_insby
    ,lt.onrouteid as tms_trip_onrouteid
    ,lt.uuid as tms_trip_uuid
    ,lt.insbyuser as tms_trip_insbyuser
    ,lt.thirdpartyid as tms_trip_thirdpartyid
    ,lt.timehash as tms_trip_timehash
    ,lt.onroutestatus as tms_trip_onroutestatus
    ,to_timestamp(lt.lastupdate) as tms_trip_lastupdate
    ,lt.lastlng as tms_trip_lastlng
    ,lt.lastlat as tms_trip_lastlat
    ,lt.controllerid as tms_trip_controllerid
    ,lt.trackstatus as tms_trip_trackstatus
    ,lt.lastrackid as tms_trip_lastrackid
    ,lt.customer as tms_trip_customer
    ,lt.bookings as tms_trip_bookings
    ,lt.controller as tms_trip_controller
    ,lt.transporter as tms_trip_transporter
    ,lt.legacyid as tms_trip_legacyid
    ,lt.originatedfrom as tms_trip_originatedfrom
    ,lt.local as tms_trip_local
    ,to_timestamp(lt.startdate) as tms_trip_startdate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.enddate) as tms_trip_enddate
    ,lt.actualdeliverydate as tms_trip_actualdeliverydate
    ,lt.note as tms_trip_note
    ,to_timestamp(lt.deliverydate) as tms_trip_deliverydate
    ,lt.internalexternal as tms_trip_internalexternal
    ,lt.pickupstartaddress as tms_trip_pickupstartaddress

FROM publictrip lt

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms
AS
SELECT 
    lt.id as tms_trip_id
    ,lt.driverid as tms_trip_driverid
    ,lt.vehicleid as tms_trip_vehicleid
    ,lt.trailerid as tms_trip_trailerid
    ,lt.trailer2id as tms_trip_sectrailerid
    ,ts.description as tms_trip_status
    ,null as tms_trip_routeid
    ,lt.routeid as tms_trip_opsrouteid
    ,lt.dispatchaddress as tms_trip_startfromaddress
    ,lt.dispatchlongitude as tms_trip_startfromlat
    ,lt.dispatchlatitude as tms_trip_startfromlng
    ,lt.dispatchdate as tms_trip_dispatchdate
    ,lt.destinationaddress as tms_trip_stopaddress
    ,lt.destinationlongitude as tms_trip_stoplat
    ,lt.destinationlatitude as tms_trip_stoplng
    ,null as tms_trip_insdate
    ,null as tms_trip_moddate
    ,null as tms_trip_insby
    ,null as tms_trip_onrouteid
    ,lt.userid as tms_trip_uuid
    ,null as tms_trip_insbyuser
    ,null as tms_trip_thirdpartyid
    ,null as tms_trip_timehash
    ,null as tms_trip_onroutestatus
    ,null as tms_trip_lastupdate
    ,null as tms_trip_lastlng
    ,null as tms_trip_lastlat
    ,null as tms_trip_controllerid
    ,null as tms_trip_trackstatus
    ,null as tms_trip_lastrackid
    ,null as tms_trip_customer
    ,null as tms_trip_bookings
    ,null as tms_trip_controller
    ,null as tms_trip_transporter
    ,null as tms_trip_legacyid
    ,null as tms_trip_originatedfrom
    ,null as tms_trip_local
    ,null as tms_trip_startdate
    ,null as tms_trip_enddate
    ,null as tms_trip_actualdeliverydate
    ,null as tms_trip_note
    ,null as tms_trip_deliverydate
    ,null as tms_trip_internalexternal
    ,null as tms_trip_pickupstartaddress   
FROM dboLHTrip lt
LEFT JOIN dboLHTrackStatus ts on ts.id = lt.tripstatusid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip
AS
SELECT 
    st.*
    ,d.id as orv_dispatch_id
    ,d.lmsid as orv_dispatch_lmsid
    ,d.vid as orv_dispatch_vid
    ,d.did as orv_dispatch_did
    ,d.status as orv_dispatch_status
    ,to_timestamp(d.startdate) as orv_dispatch_startdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.stopdate) as orv_dispatch_stopdate
    ,d.vehicletype as orv_dispatch_vehicletype
    ,d.uid as orv_dispatch_uid
    ,to_timestamp(d.estdepdate) as orv_dispatch_estdepdate
    ,d.trailer as orv_dispatch_trailer
    ,d.trailer2 as orv_dispatch_trailer2
    ,d.fromlocid as orv_dispatch_fromlocid
    ,d.tolocid as orv_dispatch_tolocid
    ,d.site as orv_dispatch_site
    ,to_timestamp(d.lastupdate) as orv_dispatch_lastupdate
    ,d.etastatus as orv_dispatch_etastatus
    ,d.startinglat as orv_dispatch_startinglat
    ,d.startinglng as orv_dispatch_startinglng
    ,d.endinglat as orv_dispatch_endinglat
    ,d.endinglng as orv_dispatch_endinglng
    ,d.startingfrom as orv_dispatch_startingfrom
    ,d.goingto as orv_dispatch_goingto
    ,d.importissue as orv_dispatch_importissue
    ,to_timestamp(d.insdate) as orv_dispatch_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.estarrdate) as orv_dispatch_estarrdate
    ,d.duration as orv_dispatch_duration
    ,d.distance as orv_dispatch_distance
    ,d.cost as orv_dispatch_cost
    ,d.stoplat as orv_dispatch_stoplat
    ,d.stoplng as orv_dispatch_stoplng
    ,d.stopreason as orv_dispatch_stopreason
    ,d.startodo as orv_dispatch_startodo
    ,d.stopodo as orv_dispatch_stopodo
    ,d.expduration as orv_dispatch_expduration
    ,d.expdistance as orv_dispatch_expdistance
    ,d.expcost as orv_dispatch_expcost
    ,d.collectionid as orv_dispatch_collectionid
    ,d.crew as orv_dispatch_crew
    ,d.crewnames as orv_dispatch_crewnames
    ,d.bocloseuid as orv_dispatch_bocloseuid
    ,d.routing as orv_dispatch_routing
    ,d.swapct as orv_dispatch_swapct
    ,d.debriefed as orv_dispatch_debriefed
    ,d.debriefnotes as orv_dispatch_debriefnotes
    ,d.bopin as orv_dispatch_bopin
    ,d.cpicost as orv_dispatch_cpicost
    ,d.labourcost as orv_dispatch_labourcost
    ,d.maintcost as orv_dispatch_maintcost
    ,d.inscost as orv_dispatch_inscost
    ,d.tollcost as orv_dispatch_tollcost
    ,d.fuelcost as orv_dispatch_fuelcost
    ,d.internal as orv_dispatch_internal
    ,d.childids as orv_dispatch_childids
    ,d.guid as orv_dispatch_guid
    ,d.timedefinite as orv_dispatch_timedefinite
    ,d.orvcode as orv_dispatch_orvcode
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstopdepoenter) as orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenter
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstartdepoexit) as orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexit
    ,d.reroutect as orv_dispatch_reroutect
    ,to_timestamp(d.actualarrdate) as orv_dispatch_actualarrdate
    ,d.physicalstartlat as orv_dispatch_physicalstartlat
    ,d.physicalstartlng as orv_dispatch_physicalstartlng
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstartdepoexitapp) as orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexitapp
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstopdepoenterapp) as orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenterapp
    ,to_timestamp(d.uncanceldate) as orv_dispatch_uncanceldate
    ,d.uncancelusername as orv_dispatch_uncancelusername
    ,d.lmsdebrifed as orv_dispatch_lmsdebrifed
    ,d.reviseddebrief as orv_dispatch_reviseddebrief
    ,d.lhtransporter as orv_dispatch_lhtransporter
    ,d.triptype as orv_dispatch_triptype
    ,d.startreason as orv_dispatch_startreason
    ,d.route as orv_dispatch_route
    ,d.tmstraileridentify as orv_dispatch_tmstraileridentify
    ,d.tmstrailer2identify as orv_dispatch_tmstrailer2identify
    ,d.tmscontroller as orv_dispatch_tmscontroller
    ,d.routekey as orv_dispatch_routekey
    ,d.courierid as orv_dispatch_courierid
    ,to_timestamp(d.originalstartdate) as orv_dispatch_originalstartdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.originalextarrival) as orv_dispatch_originalextarrival
    ,d.recomputeoriginals as orv_dispatch_recomputeoriginals
    ,d.originalextdistance as orv_dispatch_originalextdistance
    ,d.originalextduration as orv_dispatch_originalextduration
    ,to_timestamp(d.moddate) as orv_dispatch_moddate
    ,d.tmsmode as orv_dispatch_tmsmode
    ,d.driversignature as orv_dispatch_driversignature

FROM sttrip_tmp st
LEFT JOIN publicDispatch d on d.lmsid = st.tms_trip_id and d.vehicletype = 2
